channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Meta's $300 Quest 3S Headset Significantly Lowers VR's Buy-In Price
item.description: The Meta Quest 3S has nearly all the same capabilities as the Meta Quest 3, but costs $200 less. It ships in October.

item.title: Meta teases Orion, ‘the most advanced glasses the world has ever seen’
item.description: At Wednesday’s Meta Connect event, CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced what he described as Meta teases Orion, ‘the most advanced glasses the world has ever...

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg says Meta AI has nearly 500 million users
item.description: Meta had previously noted that there are more than 400 million monthly users across the world. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal us...

item.title: 8 Best Portable Power Stations (2024): Power Capacity, Portability, Camping, and More
item.description: Whether you're going off-grid or safeguarding against blackouts, these beefy, WIRED-tested batteries can keep the lights on.

item.title: Meta Teaches Its Ray-Ban Smart Glasses Some New AI Tricks
item.description: The on-board Meta AI agent can now set a reminder to buy whatever the camera is pointed at, among other enhancements.

item.title: Meta updates Ray-Ban smart glasses with real-time AI video, reminders, and QR code scanning
item.description: The Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses got an update with new familiar smartphone features and AI capabilities coming later in 2024. © 2024 TechCrunch. All ri...

item.title: Meta Ray-Bans are getting live translation
item.description: Meta has yet to announce the languages that will be initial available, though judging from the above statement, it seems them will initially be limite...

item.title: Meta Releases Llama 3.2—and Gives Its AI a Voice
item.description: Meta’s AI assistants can now talk and see the world. The company is also releasing the multimodal Llama 3.2, a free model with visual skills.

item.title: The Viral ‘Goodbye Meta AI’ Copypasta Will Not Protect You
item.description: Resharing a post on Facebook, Instagram, or another social media platform is not how you legally protect your data or opt out of anything.

item.title: Meta Connect 2024: Quest 3S headset, Meta AI upgrades, Ray-Ban Meta real-time video and more revealed
item.description: Meta Connect 2024 is starting soon, and with it comes the expectation of reveals and updates to Meta’s latest AI model and metaverse ambitions. The de...
